metadata.title: CVE-2012-4458 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The AMQP type decoder in Apache Qpid 0.20 and earlier allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and servercrash) via a large number of zero width elements in the client-propertiesmap in a connection.start-ok message.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
